title: Crystal & Herb Taylor
author: FGB UK
description: Crystal Taylor sings Country Gospel Songs to bring 'Christmas cheer in this crisis year' and Herb Taylor shares his real life story of hope and salvation....
cleaned_text: Power your marketing strategy with perfectly branded videos to drive better ROI. Host virtual events and webinars to increase engagement and generate leads. Inspire employees with compelling live and on-demand video experiences. Build a site and generate income from purchases, subscriptions, and courses. Please enable JavaScript to experience Vimeo in all of its glory. from FGB UK Crystal Taylor sings Country Gospel Songs to bring 'Christmas cheer in this crisis year' and Herb Taylor shares his real life story of hope and salvation. They were singing and speaking live from Canada on a Warrington FGBUK Zoom meeting.
